verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty,<s%> <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> due to His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H7812>Worship<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1927>array.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is upon the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> The <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H9202>glory<s%> <S%H7481>thunders,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H3581>powerful,<s%> The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1926>majestic.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H730>cedars;<s%> Yes, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7665>breaks<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
And He makes <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H7540>skip<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5695>calf,<s%> And <S%H8303>Sirion<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>ox.<s%>
The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9123>shakes<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9123>shakes<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> makes the <S%H355>deer<s%> to <S%H9123>calve,<s%> And <S%H2834>strips<s%> the <S%H9194>forests<s%> <S%H2834>bare,<s%> And in His <S%H1964>temple<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H9202>"Glory!<s%>"
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> [as <S%H4428>King<s%>] at the <S%H3999>flood;<s%> Yes, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>sits<s%> as King <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> to His <S%H5971>people;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> His <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
